headline: Northern Trust Enhances Dynamic Currency Hedging Capability
summary: LONDON, February 26, 2026--Northern Trust (Nasdaq: NTRS) has added Berenberg to its framework of dynamic currency hedging solutions, enabling Northern Trust’s clients to incorporate third-party currency management strategies, such as Berenberg’s AI based models, into their range of risk management choices.
